entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of light snow beginning before morning. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
